It's ready to deliver a flurry of incapacitating poison needles, followed by a quick blade right under your fifth rib. ---- “I never stabbed anything that didn't stop being an immediate problem.”
-Jillian Zamussels, Erfworld, Rob Balder}} ==Useful Info== '''Spriggan assassins''' are some of the more dangerous [[list of spriggans|spriggan]] opponents you can encounter, especially when part of a group. Armed with a [[blowgun]], a [[dagger]] or [[quick blade]], and an assortment of debilitating [[needle]]s, spriggan assassins can [[confusion|confuse]] or [[paralyse]] you even if you have [[poison]] resistance. Once in melee, they will then [[stab]] you for significant amounts of damage. Spriggan assassins can be found accompanying [[the Enchantress]] and in certain spriggan-themed vaults. ==Tips & Tricks== *It's more than a little difficult to have both [[stasis]] and [[clarity]] at the same time, so a strong offense may be the best defense here. They're evasive but fragile, so try to hit them with strong unavoidable attacks if possible. ==History== Spriggan assassins were added in [[0.13]] and removed in [[0.15]] [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
